animeTitle: Kimi ga Nozomu Eien: Ayu Mayu Gekijou
animeDescription: A spin-off show from Kimi ga Nozomu Eien. It's about the daily adventures of Ayu and Mayu, the two waitresses from Sky Temple.   (Source: AniDB)
